History
=======

0.2.0 (2023-01-05)
------------------

* Modernize for more recent pythons and more recent packages. Drop support for Python 3.6.  Fix issues #11, #14, #16. Add feature #12.

------------------

* Fix issues #1, #3, #5

0.1.4 (2020-11-02)
------------------

* Fix issue #4

0.1.3 (2020-10-15)
------------------

* Fix issue #2 - cli not working

0.1.0 (2020-09-13)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
